page.title: 12SARAH'S DAY
page.content:
I get up at 8 o'clock and put on my school clothes we are not forced to wear school uniform.The clothes I usually wear are a blue pinifore dress and a blouse and a knitted pullover my grandma knits for me.I go down stairs and get my breakfast I have cornflakes and a drink of tea after that I put my spelling book in my blue shoulder bag say goodbye to my mam kiss,my cat and kitten and go to school which is only 400 metres away.At school we start with assembly, after that we have Maths or English.I like school because I meet all my friends, my best friend is Suzanne we are always laughing and giggling.
Sarah Hodgson age 8.
